welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Big Bear City, where the beauty of nature and the charm of our small town come together. Get ready to experience our famous hiking trails, stunning lakes, and cozy mountain town vibes. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Banning Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Norton AFB Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apple Valley Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Apple Valley Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
